title: Touhou Sangetsusei: Eastern and Little Nature Deity
original_name: 東方三月精 Eastern and Little Nature Deity
sinopse:
This manga takes place in Gensokyou, the setting for most of the Touhou games.

It's the story of 3 fairies and their daily tricking to visitors of Hakurei Shrine, getting revenged, and so on.
